metadata.synopsis: One-liner for refugees in the sewers, while getting shot at by Bhaal cultists.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Ensure you are in a deal with OrinLoad up CTY_Main_AGo to -20; 18; 789Click on |Refugee| - S_LOW_Refugee02 267decbc-7902-4e60-bb35-1fe4b6929bf4

1.speaker: Refugee Khathi
1.text: Help me, oh gods, please. I don't want to die.
1.context: NodeContext: cutlists on the other side of the sewer are firing shots at the refugees. Has just seen their friends die, freaking out as more shots are incoming.
